*div1 type="summary"* *p*William S. Parrott to Austin, November 7, 1827. Masonic political organizations in Mexico—York and Scotch rites. Political conditions. Poinsett.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-07-1827">Nov. 7th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*My Dear Sir It is with heartfelt pleasure I now acknowledge receipt of your much esteemed favour of the *date_mentioned n="10-22-1827">22nd ulto*/date_mentioned* — As it is presumable *person_mentioned*Mr Almy*/person_mentioned* may have given you some of the most remarkable occurrences with me of late. I shall proceed without ceremony to your many preguntas Much excitement has and still exists among more properly speaking the *person_mentioned*Patriots */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*anti republicans*/person_mentioned* than between the *person_mentioned*masonic brethren*/person_mentioned* for what, we call *person_mentioned*Yorkoino */person_mentioned*is strictly speaking *person_mentioned*whig*/person_mentioned*, with us and *person_mentioned*escoseses */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Tory */person_mentioned*— Some name of distinction was necessary and as the *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*became better known about the time we established the *person_mentioned*York */person_mentioned*writ — and as every true *person_mentioned*american */person_mentioned*flocked to our standard we were in a short time able to outweigh the *person_mentioned*anti-republicans*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*Scotch party*/person_mentioned* and they began immediately to make a bug bar of *person_mentioned*yorkism */person_mentioned*and to charge *person_mentioned*Mr Poinsett*/person_mentioned* with the crime of introducing a system or machine by which he intended to carry on all his intrigues a thousand ugly things have been said and his answer to the *person_mentioned*congress of *location_mentioned*Veracruz*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* which I now hand you will give you some Idia of what they wished to make him appear before the public So much for the *person_mentioned*Scotch */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*yorkism*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*If you have a wish to forward a petition to the *location_mentioned*grand lodge*/location_mentioned*, I will see that you have your *location_mentioned*charter*/location_mentioned*, to this effect you will form a *location_mentioned*lodge */location_mentioned*in your *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*and extend a petition to the *location_mentioned*grand lodge of Mexico*/location_mentioned* signed by all the *person_mentioned*members */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*provisional officers*/person_mentioned*; The *location_mentioned*charter */location_mentioned*will cost you perhaps 50$ though I recollect of having paid 30$ for the *location_mentioned*charter */location_mentioned*of a *location_mentioned*lodge */location_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*. Please see *person_mentioned*Jesus Ma Ybarra*/person_mentioned* of that place from whom you can get all necessary information and to whom please present my best respects — Fear not but the *person_mentioned*Yorkinos */person_mentioned*will gain the day. the poor *person_mentioned*Scotch */person_mentioned*are making their last struggle I have no doubt but the true object of *person_mentioned*masonry */person_mentioned*has been in some measure perverted with us; but at the time when the salvation of the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*perhaps — depended, upon such a measure and when it became necessary to try their strength which manifested itself in the last elections Much to the mortification of the *person_mentioned*Scotch Gentry*/person_mentioned* and fortunately about that time the plan of *person_mentioned*Padre Arenas*/person_mentioned* was discovered in which some of their *person_mentioned*Chieftains */person_mentioned*were complicated, I am so far from believing that the establishment of a *location_mentioned*lodge */location_mentioned*by the *person_mentioned*americans in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*would prove injurious that I would give my vote, and whole influence to carry into effect such a laudable purpose, and would prove to be another spoke in our wheel of transcendent importance for your *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*are spoken of in the highest terms and it has been made public and generally believed that your settlers put a stop to *person_mentioned*Edwards Fields*/person_mentioned* etc —*/p*
*p*We have had for some time a state of things heretofore unknown with us owing to the intrigue of the *person_mentioned*Scotch */person_mentioned*to get possession of the reins of *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*but they have so completely failed that I am convinced they will have to give over their point, at least for the moment and the great outcry seem to be in all parts, Expulsion of the old *person_mentioned*Spaniard*/person_mentioned*. In *location_mentioned*Michoacan Durango*/location_mentioned* to the *location_mentioned*south */location_mentioned*and other parts parties of considerable force have taken up arms against them and have committed some excesses. The States of *location_mentioned*Xalisco */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*have passed laws expelling certain *person_mentioned*classes */person_mentioned*from their *location_mentioned*territories */location_mentioned*and particularly *person_mentioned*Mexico */person_mentioned*for having published its decree on the *date_mentioned n="10-27-1827">16th ulto*/date_mentioned*. expelling all *person_mentioned*Spaniard friars*/person_mentioned*—so far so good—I have just had a private interview with the *person_mentioned*President*/person_mentioned*. He assures me all will go well he is a true *person_mentioned*Patriot */person_mentioned*but slack of energy—which by the bye turn out with the mañana folks to be often preferable at least in the present case I have no doubt of the fact We had formed a *location_mentioned*grand lodge*/location_mentioned* and 5 *location_mentioned*symbolic lodges*/location_mentioned* when *person_mentioned*Mr Poinsett*/person_mentioned* arrived in the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*he became a *person_mentioned*member */person_mentioned*and through his agency we received our *location_mentioned*charters */location_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*New York.*/location_mentioned* We are somewhat in your case respecting the abolition of slavery though not to the same extent; they propose an indemnification to *person_mentioned*slave holders*/person_mentioned* and in cases where a *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*is not able to make indemnition; the right of *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*is certainly attacked in the most flagrant manner. I hope you will have it repealed or the same principle of indemnity adopted by which we have been blessed-*/p* *p*It is difficult to guess who will be the next *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*I have no doubt but he will be an *person_mentioned*american */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Patriot */person_mentioned*some speak of *person_mentioned*Guerrero*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Pedraza */person_mentioned*etc etc I admire the decided character of the former but the latter possess[es] more qualifications than any other man in the *location_mentioned*Republic */location_mentioned*this is my opinion, The *person_mentioned*Scotch */person_mentioned*will try to get in *person_mentioned*Bravo*/person_mentioned*—or some other *person_mentioned*Scotch brother*/person_mentioned* The System of government for the *location_mentioned*territory */location_mentioned*is something like ours—The *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*is their executive, a representative or *person_mentioned*Delegate in the House of Representatives*/person_mentioned*, a *person_mentioned*judiciary */person_mentioned*something like our *person_mentioned*territorial governments*/person_mentioned* and as respects *location_mentioned*interior */location_mentioned*economy, they have a *person_mentioned*governor */person_mentioned*etc etc*/p*
*p*In short I am convinced that differences must arise from the union of two *location_mentioned*states */location_mentioned*composed of different materials like *location_mentioned*coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned*—and that a better plan might be to separate the practicability of which you should better know than myself. The only material inconvenience which strikes me at this time is the delay of the dispatch of affairs Subject to the executive, department for the rest your situation might be bettered,*/p*
*p*It was my intention to be more concise but have been led astray by a [desire] to satisfy your many enquiries] [some] of which requires a more expert [hand] than mine to do them justice I have always avoided political correspondence from motives, which have in some measure subsided, and will now with pleasure do all I can to Quench your thirst—*/p*
*p*I shall leave *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*for the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned* in the *date_mentioned n="02-xx-1828">month of February next*/date_mentioned*, it would have been sooner but for the unexpected delay of My copartner *person_mentioned*Willson */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned* he will be out in the packet for this month. Hoping to hear from you often, I remain sincerely your friend obt. and humb servt*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. S. Parrott */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*I have a file of *location_mentioned*New York papers*/location_mentioned* on the road and if they arrive in time for the mail [will] hand you a few*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Sor Don. Estevan F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
